setup_script_description: Moves focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
task: read menuitemradio in a group in a submenu
specific_user_instruction: Open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key | Use VO+Shift+Up Arrow to start DOM navigation of the menubar groups | Navigate to the "Color" group using VO + Down Arrow | Navigate to the "Color" group items using VO + Shift + Down Arrow | Navigate to 'Blue' menu item using VO + Down Arrow Key | Review the  'Blue' menu item radio button
output_assertions: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed
The name and role of the 'Text Color' group are conveyed
